content.raw:
[I did this for gazebo too](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/pull-request/904/fix-uninstall-script-to-handle-folder/diff), and I added the following as well to allow for uninstallation from folders with spaces in the name:
~~~
diff -ru ../cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in ~/osrf/gazebo/cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in
--- ../cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in	2015-03-05 02:22:10.000000000 -0800
+++ /Users/scpeters/osrf/gazebo/cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in	2015-03-03 00:26:07.000000000 -0800
@@ -8,7 +8,7 @@
   message(STATUS "Uninstalling $ENV{DESTDIR}${file}")
   if(IS_SYMLINK "$ENV{DESTDIR}${file}" OR EXISTS "$ENV{DESTDIR}${file}")
     exec_program(
-      "@CMAKE_COMMAND@" ARGS "-E remove $ENV{DESTDIR}${file}"
+      "@CMAKE_COMMAND@" ARGS "-E remove \"$ENV{DESTDIR}${file}\""
       OUTPUT_VARIABLE rm_out
       RETURN_VALUE rm_retval
       )
~~~
content.html:
I did this for gazebo too, and I added the following as well to allow for uninstallation from folders with spaces in the name:

diff -ru ../cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in ~/osrf/gazebo/cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in
--- ../cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in   2015-03-05 02:22:10.000000000 -0800
+++ /Users/scpeters/osrf/gazebo/cmake/cmake_uninstall.cmake.in  2015-03-03 00:26:07.000000000 -0800
@@ -8,7 +8,7 @@
   message(STATUS "Uninstalling $ENV{DESTDIR}${file}")
   if(IS_SYMLINK "$ENV{DESTDIR}${file}" OR EXISTS "$ENV{DESTDIR}${file}")
     exec_program(
-      "@CMAKE_COMMAND@" ARGS "-E remove $ENV{DESTDIR}${file}"
+      "@CMAKE_COMMAND@" ARGS "-E remove \"$ENV{DESTDIR}${file}\""
       OUTPUT_VARIABLE rm_out
       RETURN_VALUE rm_retval
       )
